{
    "sql": "SHOW TABLES; CREATE LOGFILE GROUP lg1 ADD UNDOFILE 'undofile.dat' INITIAL_SIZE 16M UNDO_BUFFER_SIZE = 1M ENGINE NDB; CREATE TABLESPACE ts1 ADD DATAFILE 'datafile.dat' USE LOGFILE GROUP lg1 ENGINE NDB; DROP TABLESPACE ts1 ENGINE NDB;",
    "Affected Elements": "DROP TABLESPACE, SHOW WARNINGS",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The error message generated by the DROP TABLESPACE command is misleading and does not accurately reflect the state of the tablespace."
}
